comments: API_KEY for maps api - think of it like a password - provided by Openweathermap
HINT: Use template literals to create a url with input and an API key
docstrings:
* Weather App
 * DONE: Complete getWeatherData() to return json response Promise
 * DONE: Complete searchCity() to get user input & get data using getWeatherData()
 * DONE: Complete showWeatherData() to set data in html file from response

* Retrieve weather data from openweathermap
 * HINT: Use fetch()
 * HINT: URL should look like this: 
 * https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=detroit&appid=a8e71c9932b20c4ceb0aed183e6a83bb&units=imperial

* Retrieve city input and get the weather data
 * HINT: Use the promise returned from getWeatherData()

* Show the weather data in HTML
 * HINT: make sure to console log weatherData to see what data looks like
